Alexander N. Telegin wrote:

>Yes, that's why I'm going to try NN along with statistical filter. The 
>result will be summarized according to weights for each method.
>  
>
If each technique reqults in some sort of confidence value then it might 
beneficial to evolve a network that accpets these confidence values as 
inputs rather than using hard defined weightings. Such a network may be 
able to pick up on more complex relationships between the different 
techniques. e.g. if techniques 1 & 3 say it's junk but 2 doesn't then 2 
can be assumed to be right, in other scenarios though 2's answer may be 
safely ignored. Of course there may be far more complex relationships 
than this... or maybe not :)

Colin.
